review: Love fire stick. Great series and prime movies. Now will be able to take this on vacation,watching movies on TV rather than a laptop.
author: Amtrak51

review: Love it!!! Super fast and easy to use. Set it up within 3mins and was watching movies right away! I have Amazon Prime so this was awesome. Before I would watch it videos on my iPad or laptop. Now I can enjoy Prime on my tv.
author: Veronica

review: I've had it for a little over 3 weeks,  and I love it. It's easy to use,  I watch my Netflix and Amazon Prime videos, both work just fine.
author: Lauren

review: Great way to entertain family and friends.  Easy to install and activate.  Makes a terrific gift,
author: R. Pyle

review: not very useful.  only lets you watch some Amazon prime shows for free.  Otherwise everything is pay and the services are expensive.  If I had to do again probably would not have gotten.
author: Anthony F. Uberti

review: I have enjoyed using it it helps with spare room TVs and I watch more on it than sat tv !
author: Tim Klein

review: I love it . it has its moments but it is everything it was cracked up to be in more.
author: Reelog

review: slow on downloads but I think it's my Wifi connection.  overall happy with the Fire stick and all of the options, available programs.
author: Kelly O Ryan
